resources.string: We\'re always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please connect with us at:

string.name: about_mbic
string.br: Ø VNRVJIET ED Cell in association with student’s innovation center organizing My Big Idea Competition (MBIC) on a regular basis with a theme from 2013 on words.\n\n
Ø However, VJIM students are also participating in the competition which will be extended to other nearby colleges also in future.\n\n
Ø A certificate indicating participation and details of prizes won for the idea will be given to all the participants.\n\n
Ø Its objective is to promote innovative thinking among the students and leading to scouting of Business Ideas through MSME Business Incubation support.
